description:
The Combined Beast Bong suddenly appears in Nerima! Is this the return of the Underground Empire? Faced with her mighty cannons, Team Z is in dire peril when the new Team G of Laiga-sama, Pon-chan, and Ge-cchan appear as well!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Here We Are! Robot Girls Z!
お待たせ! ロボットガールズZ
